subject: Football
lead_paragraph: Michael Strahan, who was named to the Pro Bowl seven times and set the N.F.L.’s single-season record with 22 ½ sacks, will leave a huge hole in the Giants’ defense.
snippet: Michael Strahan, who was named to the Pro Bowl seven times and set the N.F.L.’s single-season record with 22 ½ sacks, will leave a huge hole in the Giants’ defense.
